Predict and Prevent Plant Downtime


We stream your data through our custom analytics platform to alert unplanned events before they happen.


Welcome to the Industrial Internet of Oil and Gas



Automatically monitor critical processes and displays new insights and analytics

Create a smart digital oilfield by connecting your sensors, assets, and people

Streamlyne alerts, tracks, and trends major problems before it's too late



Your Plant's Down - That's A Problem


Every minute that unplanned downtime happens you:

  • Lose Money
  • Lose Control
  • Lose Productivity

Streamlyne solves this problem by alerting your operators and managers to potential issues so they are now proactive and not reactive.



Last month, our plant had a major “blockage” and if we had Streamlyne it could’ve predicted and helped prevent 3 days of downtime which cost us hundreds of thousands of dollars.

Early Adopter Customer of 15+ plants


Benefits

Less Downtime

Streamlyne helps predict and prevent downtime, and puts the control back in the hands of operators and managers to eliminate unplanned, costly events.

Improve Safety

Access the latest information on assets while working with hazardous chemicals, gases, and large interworking pieces of equipment.

Better Performance

Innovative tools give employees the power to reach individual and company-wide goals, making your company stronger and more competitive.

Real-Time Data

Make informed and safe decisions with live data while working in front of an asset.

Collaboration

Employees can now share and track their rich knowledge and experience on plant operations, historical scenarios, and insights to create an intelligent plant environment.

Self-Service

Customize how you want Streamlyne to work for you - create custom analytics, scenarios, and asset profiles. It's that simple!
